author: danielsh
msg: Make svn_opt_revision_to_string() a truly private function by not declaring
it in a public header.  Also make it not conditional upon SVN_DEBUG.

author: hwright
msg: Followup to a half-baked r38942 by adding the need for a absolute path to
(svn_wc_ensure_adm4): Take a local path, and update docs.
(svn_wc_ensure_adm3): Provide the absolute path to svn_wc_ensure_adm4().
(svn_wc_ensure_adm4): Use the provided absolute path, and rename the pool

author: danielsh
msg: Add a new API for stringifying an svn_opt_revision_t.
By requests on IRC, the API is enabled only in maintainer mode builds.
Remind to extend the new function when extending this enum.

author: hwright
msg: Deprecate svn_wc_ensure_adm3(), and allow the replacement function to take
a working copy context, in an effort to not open multiple wc_dbs.
(svn_wc_ensure_adm4): New, and use the wc context's wc_db instead of
